text: Does anyone know where we can find a contractor to code some email templates in HubSpot? Attached are the requirements

Hi <@UBQRF6HDW>, we do HubSpot HTML Email templates at Spin Group.
We usually build html emails with frameworks that help to ensure email client compatibility and where it makes sense to, also improving our efficiency. We use HubL to make text and images changeable through the email editor in HS.

We always test our emails using HubSpot’s test previews.

regarding sample emails I’ll have to talk to my boss about what we’re allowed to show due to NDA’s with our clients.

If you are interested feel free to DM me and we can discuss the timeline for your current projects and move on from there
